post:
Hello all,

We offer low cost FTP backup: https://www.robovps.biz/backup-service/
Port speed is 1 Gbit. Traffic is free on "fair play" terms.

We offer also virtual and dedicated servers in Germany with good quality and low price.
Server management panel included for free for all virtual and dedicated servers. 

You can check our new virtual server tariffs at https://www.robovps.biz/vps/

You can check our dedicated server offers on this page https://www.robovps.biz/dedicated_servers_in_germany/

We accept cards, PayPal, Paysera, Webmoney, PerfectMoney, Yandex, QIWI and crypto currencies.
